post.description: Returns a greeting text, based on your name.

post.summary: Performs multiple mutations in a linear and atomic manner.

requestBody.description: An array of mutation operations. For syntax, see the [Atomic Operations documentation](https://jsonapi.org/ext/atomic/).

200.description: All operations were successfully applied, which resulted in additional changes.

204.description: All operations were successfully applied, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: An operation is not accessible or a client-generated ID is used.

404.description: A resource or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

200.description: Successfully returns the found people, or an empty array if none were found.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

post.summary: Adds existing tags to the tags relationship of an individual todoItem.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the todoItem to add tags to.

requestBody.description: The identities of the tags to add to the tags relationship.

204.description: The tags were successfully added, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The todoItem or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

patch.summary: Assigns existing tags to the tags relationship of an individual todoItem.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the todoItem whose tags relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identities of the tags to assign to the tags relationship, or an empty array to clear the relationship.

204.description: The tags relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The todoItem or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

delete.summary: Removes existing tags from the tags relationship of an individual todoItem.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the todoItem to remove tags from.

requestBody.description: The identities of the tags to remove from the tags relationship.

204.description: The tags were successfully removed, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The todoItem or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.
